price: Na unijaalie nitajwe kwa wema na watu watakao kuja baadaye.
arabic: وَٱجۡعَل لِّي لِسَانَ صِدۡقٖ فِي ٱلۡأٓخِرِينَ
footnotes: Na nijaalie nipate sifa nzuri na kumbusho jema kwa kaumu zitazo kuja baada yangu, mabaki yake yasalie mpaka Siku ya Kiyama.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: wa-ij'ʿal lī lisāna ṣid'qin fī al-ākhirīna
